item.title: Directing Vellum Simulations
item.description: Check Houdini.school 3 Ways to add forces for vellum Noise Chops -> right-click add MotionFX Attribute on SOP [!

item.title: Vellum Houdini
item.description: Vellum is a unified solver for softbody dynamics (hair, wire, cloth) Vellum is similar to Houdini “grains” -PBD (Position based dynamics) - Vellum is a continuation of grains.

item.title: Vellum Interaction
item.description: Occasionally you will want to make your different physics systems interact. This can be difficult. Vellum Shape Match H19 Nodes 02 | Shape Match - YouTube
